summary: James Travis "Jim" Reeves  was an American country singer.
full_text: James Travis "Jim" Reeves  was an American country and popular music singer-songwriter. With records charting from the 1950s to the 1980s, he became well known as a practitioner of the Nashville sound . Known as "Gentleman Jim", his songs continued to chart for years after his death. Reeves died in the crash of a private airplane. He is a member of both the Country Music and Texas Country Music Halls of Fame.
title: Jim Reeves
